messages.message: Hi team! QQ: NWM is looking to use the Automation Metrics (https://platform.instabase.com/docs/apis/v2-apis/automation-metrics/index.html), Job (https://platform.instabase.com/docs/apis/jobs/), and  Auth APIs (https://platform.instabase.com/docs/apis/auth/index.html) in AI Hub. I _think_ I remember hearing they can still be leveraged with ai hub, but wanted to sanity check -  are they available, or only supported in IB Platform? Didnâ€™t see them in the ai hub docs. Thanks!
@Atul Grover can you confirm how we have used metrics APIs in NW?

Metrics api is available for AIHub, the documentation was supposed to come by Q2 (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05BJCNKZAM/p1746029478388679?thread_ts=1745951858.900009&cid=C05BJCNKZAM)
relevant thread with API details: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05BJCNKZAM/p1745951858900009
